title: Immediate hypnotic induction / non-verbal hypnosis masterclass
description:
Dr. Marco Paret demonstrates an immediate hypnotic induction with his students. They participated in his masterclass in Brazil, to learn and experience the most unique non-verbal hypnosis techniques. Dr. Paret travels all around the world to teach the techniques of ancient traditions and to share his knowledge. The subject in this hypnotic experience entered in a powerful hypnotic induction state, that transformed them deeply. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
